pageContext.claim: “Illegal Immigration costs the USA over 300 Billion Dollars a year. There is no reason for this, and things are being set in motion to have this number come WAY DOWN.”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump at various times has estimated that illegal immigration annually costs the United States $100 billion, $200 billion, even $275 billion. Trump appears to be relying on a partisan study that came up with an estimate of $135 billion, but has been criticized for its methodology, which critics say overstates costs and understates benefits. Other analysts say the cost of illegal immigration is much lower, if anything – and over time may even result in the net gain for the United States. Over 75 years, each immigrant represents $259,000 in net present value for federal, state and local governments, according to a 2016 report by National Academies on the economic impact of the U.S. immigration system.
